title: UK House Price Index: reports
description: Reports for the UK House Price Index (UK HPI) for England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland, including in CSV format.
datasetNotes: On the landing page scroll down to the most recent date and click on the data downloads link this will open another page  scroll down to full file and click on the link this will open a csv file.
sizingNotes: The full download is available as a CSV
notes: Although not specifically Covid-19, it is mentioned in the report, the impact of the pandemic may be derived.
